General.Name: LianChuang Electronic Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Lianchuang Electronic Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of optics and optoelectronics in China and internationally. It offers optical parts comprising plastic structural parts, plastic lens, aspherical molded glass lens, spherical glass lens, and optical precision molds; HD wide angle lens and modules; and vehicle camera lens, including blind spot surveillance lens, anti-collision warning lens, driver fatigue reminder lens, panoramic parking camera, reversing camera, and driving recorder lens. The company also provides mobile phone lens and imaging modules, AR/VR lens, touch screens, display modules, and integrated touchscreen modules. Its products used in mart terminals, smart cars, smart homes, smart cities, etc. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Nanchang, China.
